title: Match making broken
body: Last game I'm playing with D4/D3 and I queue back up and I have a plat 5 in my game,, ontop of 3 other plats. I'm Diamond 4, I should not have to play witwh plat 5 team mates. I thought match making in high elo was fixed?

replies.body:
Matchmaking will place players together based on their MMR, who's queuing at the time, role, etc.  In general, it's based on MMR and not somebody's placement in ranked.  Players could have loss or win streaks, and their border only reflects their previous season.  If each team's MMR average doesn't align closely, then your LP lost or gained can adjust according to that.  

Our [matchmaking ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752954-Matchmaking-Guide)guide provides some solid information on how all this works.  

I hope that helps clear things up, and best of luck in your ranked games!

Then there is a bug that needs to be looked into. The games before that I was going vs D4/D3 with some D2s. The games before that for my plat team mates they were going against plat 2-3s. This is a full tier difference. The queue time was only around 7 minutes so I don't know why the window opened up so much that it allowed for such an imbalanced game.

GG team lost. Had 2 levels on enemy jungler but couldn't carry the 2-12-2 Top lane rengar that started to rush zhonyas, the plat  5 karthus that couldn't land a Q to save his life or the plat ADC that didn't realize CS gives gold.

Match making is supposed to be balanced teams. What is the point of grinding away and earning diamond if you are going to be thrown into games with all plat team mtes?

And it isn't my MMR, games before that I was going vs D4 - D2. Beat Sirhcez in a game  so it decides to pair me with plats?
